humanMachineDialogue.author: Memory Reasoning
humanMachineDialogue.text: According to the pathology report, one out of two assessed lymph nodes is positive for metastasis (Axillary 1/2). Based on the new rules provided, N1 indicates metastases in 1 to 3 axillary lymph nodes. Therefore, the N stage for this patient's cancer is N1.

humanMachineDialogue.author: ZS Reasoning
humanMachineDialogue.text: The report indicates that 1 out of 2 examined axillary lymph nodes is positive for metastasis (Axillary 1/2). This corresponds to an N1 stage, as defined by the American Joint Committee on Cancer (AJCC) staging system for breast cancer.
